name: Rolling Arrays
description: Rolling arrays journey started in 2009, helping enterprises drive value from HR Tech solutions to attract, develop, and retain best-fit talent. Over the years, our good work helped us to be recognized as a great HR Transformation Solutions partner in the APAC. We honed our expertise in HR Tech Consulting, diving into SAP Success Factors implementation to help script people-centric success for our clients. Create positive Human Experience across our customers and employees. For our customers, we strive to achieve our purpose by designing HR Process and HR systems that accelerate their professional growth. For our employees, we constantly nurture a culture of care, growth and gratitude.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Driving SAP SuccessFactors led HR Transformation since 2009
ShortDescription: Leaders In HR Tech Consulting With SF As Our Ace

Highlights.name: SAP SuccessFactors Consulting
Highlights.description: Integrates SAP modules with HR Tech expertise for streamlined workflow.

Highlights.name: Implementation
Highlights.description: Deploys full suite or specific modules for optimized solutions.

Highlights.name: Change Management
Highlights.description: Drives adoption and enhances functionality post-implementation through feedback and configuration.

enhanced_description: Rolling Arrays, established in 2009, is a recognized HR Technology consulting and HR Transformation solutions partner with extensive expertise in SAP SuccessFactors implementation. Operating primarily in the APAC region, they help a wide range of enterprises, including Small, Large, and Global organizations, to attract, develop, and retain best-fit talent. Their comprehensive service offerings include SAP SuccessFactors Consulting for integrating SAP modules and streamlining workflows, full suite or specific module Implementation for optimized solutions, and robust Change Management to drive adoption and enhance functionality post-implementation. Rolling Arrays focuses on designing people-centric HR processes and systems to create a positive Human Experience, accelerate professional growth, and boost outcomes such as Hiring Manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Streamlining HR workflows through SAP module integration
Improving talent attraction, development, and retention strategies
Enhancing Human Experience across the workforce
Boosting Hiring Manager confidence and productivity
Managing change and ensuring adoption of new HR technologies
Deploying full SAP SuccessFactors suites or specific modules
competitive_advantages: Specialized expertise in SAP SuccessFactors implementation and consulting
Proven track record since 2009 in HR Tech Consulting and HR Transformation
Recognized as a leading HR Transformation Solutions partner in APAC
Comprehensive service offerings including Consulting, Implementation, and Change Management for SAP SuccessFactors
Ability to serve a broad range of company sizes from small to global enterprises
integration_capabilities: Integration of SAP modules with HR Tech expertise
roi_benefits: Drives value from HR Tech solutions
Boosts Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
primary_users: Client Employees (as end-users of implemented HR systems)
scalability_features: Capable of serving small, large, and global enterprises
